${ModID}:ID_18_Power.NAME: Collateral Damage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Mark deal X to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_25_Power.NAME: Desperate Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard X cards at random at the Start of next Turn.

${ModID}:ID_26_Power.NAME: Insurance
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw or discard a card this turn gain X Block.

${ModID}:ID_27_Power.NAME: Caffeine
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw X cards.

${ModID}:ID_30_Power.NAME: Headstart
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}At the start of your turn, the first X cost X card{X|>0=s} do{X|<1=es}n't consume energy.

${ModID}:ID_31_Power.NAME: Raising Bars
DESCRIPTIONS: The effect of cost X cards will always be at least X.

${ModID}:ID_32_Power.NAME: Conspiracy Theory
DESCRIPTIONS: You are confused for the next X turns.

${ModID}:ID_36_Power.NAME: Stay Sharp
DESCRIPTIONS: When the next X cards are discarded, play the top card of your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_38_Power.NAME: Horrify
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage this turn apply X Vulnerable to every enemy.

${ModID}:ID_39_Power.NAME: Countdown
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}After X {X|>1=cards are discarded|card is discarded} deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_40_Power.NAME: Anger Form
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}Whenever an attack is played put X copies of it into your discard pile.

${ModID}:ID_41_Power.NAME: Fundraiser
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}When this card is drawn exhaust it and draw X card{X|>1=s}. Lose X [E] at the start of next turn.

${ModID}:ID_45_Power.NAME: Choo-Choo Mail
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain X Mark.

${ModID}:ID_49_Power.NAME: Compost Heap
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}After a card has been discarded reduce the cost of the top card of of your discard pile {!X!|@=by X|>0=to 0} [E].

${ModID}:ID_52_Power.NAME: Improve Potency
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play the next cost X card, its effects are increased by X.

${ModID}:ID_53_Power.NAME: Hyperfocus
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}Gain X [E] at the start of your turn. Draw X card{X|>1=s} less per turn.

${ModID}:ID_60_Power.NAME: Power Punch
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}Punches cost X [E] less. Draw cards whenever you play a Punch, when upgraded.

${ModID}:ID_63_Power.NAME: Power Punch
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}Punches cost X [E] less. Draw cards whenever you play a Punch, when upgraded.

${ModID}:ID_67_Power.NAME: Splatter
DESCRIPTIONS: If this enemy dies deal X damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ID_70_Power.NAME: Rip off
DESCRIPTIONS: When ever you play a Bargain ALL enemies lose X HP.

${ModID}:ID_71_Power.NAME: Sacrificial Pawn
DESCRIPTIONS: {@@}The next X card{X|>1=s} that gets discarded return to your hand.

${ModID}:ID_73_Power.NAME: Great Deal
DESCRIPTIONS: {Whenever a X card is played add X Bargain into your hand.

${ModID}:ID_74_Power.NAME: Fading
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove 1 Fading at the start of each turn. When you reach 0 Fading, die.
